Job Title: Bill and Account Collector
Company: Kelley PLC

About Us:
Kelley PLC is a leading financial services company dedicated to providing innovative solutions to individuals and businesses. We pride ourselves on our commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion, and strive to create a workplace where everyone feels valued and empowered to succeed.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Bill and Account Collector to join our team. As a Bill and Account Collector, you will be responsible for collecting payments from clients, resolving billing discrepancies, and maintaining accurate records of all transactions.

Responsibilities:

 Collect payments from clients via phone, email, and mail
 Resolve billing discrepancies and negotiate payment plans with clients
 Maintain accurate records of all transactions and update client accounts accordingly
 Communicate with clients to resolve outstanding balances and prevent further delinquency
 Meet or exceed monthly collection targets

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of experience in accounts receivable, collections, or a related field
 Strong communication and negotiation skills
 Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines
 Proficiency in Microsoft Office and accounting software

What We Offer:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $45,000 to $60,000 USD per year, based on your experience and skills. In addition, we offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401(k) matching, and paid time off.

Our Commitment to Inclusion:
We value an inclusive team and invite individuals with disabilities to apply. Our diversity efforts include actively seeking candidates with disabilities to join our team. We believe that a diverse workforce is essential to driving innovation and success, and we are committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels valued and empowered to succeed.
